metadata.title: CVE-2021-29981 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue present in lowering/register allocation could have led to obscure but deterministic register confusion failures in JITted code that would lead to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91 and Thunderbird < 91.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '91.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
